questions.text: Is it acceptable to copy-and-paste a sentence written by someone else into your paper and simply add quotation marks around it?

answers.q2a: Yes, that shows it is not original text

answers.q3q: Change a few words to make it your own and cite it
answers.q3b: Put quotation marks around the text and cite it
answers.q3c: Use only the idea without citing it

questions.text: You re-use paragraphs from a paper you wrote last semester and put it into a new assignment, and you don’t cite it because it’s your own work. Is this plagiarism?
A source doesn’t need to be cited if it’s collaboratively written on the web like Wikipedia
